entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `StartupValidator` multiple registrations. #102061
    Future
  • Dotnet 8 JsonSerializerOptions Breaking change #102055
  • AssemblyNameInfo.FullName does not include public key #102051
  • ILStrip task incorrectly adds a body to `extern` methods #102045
    9.0.0
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Memory Corruption #102046
  • Unifying Integer types #102049
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 15 Regressions on 5/4/2024 5:29:12 AM #102047
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 5/3/2024 3:54:35 PM #102044
    9.0.0
  • System.Buffers.Tests timeout on wasm MT #102040
  • Mono LLVMAOT fails for Sse2_r and Sse2_ro with Invalid Record #102037

Closed

  • System.IO.Packaging.ZipArchive: No means to set the zip header bits 1 and 2 #88812
    Future
  • Application Not Looking in Working Directory for .NET #102028
  • Add EVEX encoding opmask (k) register masking to xarch emitter #80821
    9.0.0
  • Add optimization for scalar/vector conversion of `uint32`/`uint64` to/from packed `float`/`double` #80829
    9.0.0
  • Add optimization for scalar conversion of `float`/`double` to `ulong`. #89279
    9.0.0
  • DynamicallyAccessedMembers attribute ignored on generic attribute when publishing for AOT #102023
  • [API Proposal]: Allow lookups using alternative key on ``SortedSet<T>`` and ``SortedDictionary<T>`` #101694
  • Remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure in dotnet linux #102018
  • [JIT] Optimise `Vector128.AndNot(v1, v2) == Vector128<T>.Zero` to `Sse41.TestC(v1, v2)` #87792
    Future
  • Error with sign XML exception "Cryptography_Xml_CreateHashAlgorithmFailed" in iOS .net 8 #102033
  • The JSON property name for 'IMyPoco3.Bar' collides with another property #102043
  • JsonConverter fails with nullable enums. #102006
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named `DOTNET_GCPath` #101080
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #102063
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add flag for NAOT linking, but not enabling server GC #102062
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview4] disable new EH on win-arm64 #102060
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Unpin arm build image, use Debian 12 helix images #102059
    needs-area-label
  • Target NetCoreAppToolCurrent in ILC test projects #102058
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add the autocreated .mono/ folder to .gitignore #102054
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #102053
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Testing] Test #92901 on top of #101869 changes #102050
  • [mono] miscellaneous AOT optimizations #102039
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • add support for Impersonation and Delegation to HttpWebRequest #102038
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Switch AOT compilers to use AssemblyNameInfo #102036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • disable new EH on win-arm64 #102052
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Suppress -Wformat-truncation for older GCC #101557
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Enable AVX512 embedded masking for most other intrinsics #101886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify/optimize Int128 comparison operators #101848
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix typos in TensorPrimitives MultiplyAdd documentation #101845
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] Simplify flags for passing struct in registers. #102041
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono][gc] Remove reliance on regs/stack scanning in some cases #101478
    area-GC-mono
  • [mono] Use simdhash for aot method lookup ptr->methodinfo cache #102029
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add more issue links to trimmer assertions #102027
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Pin arm image to unblock ci #102035
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named DOTNET_GCPath #101874
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Fused* APIs #102007
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Tensor wave 1 API's. #101196
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #99666
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add PropertyNode for dependency analysis #102026
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host, 9.0.0
  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Test #101822
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport crossgen2 changes) #101869
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Make constructors private for parts of the ComInterfaceGenerator that should only be created from their static methods #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Unify debug views of immutable dictionaries #100745
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • WIP: another workaround for hardcoded compiler versions #100828
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JSMarshalAs JSType Adjust comments and type parameters #101981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
